00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections;
00025 
00026 using Niry;
00027 using Niry.Utils;
00028 
00029 using NyFolder;
00030 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00031 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00032 
00033 namespace NyFolder.GUI {
00035     public class NetworkStore : Gtk.ListStore {
00036         // ============================================
00037         // PUBLIC CONST Members
00038         // ============================================
00039         public const int COL_USER_INFO = 0;
00040         public const int COL_NAME = 1;
00041         public const int COL_PIXBUF = 2;
00042 
00043         // ============================================
00044         // PRIVATE Members
00045         // ============================================
00046         private UserInfo rmUser = null;
00047 
00048         // ============================================
00049         // PUBLIC Constructors
00050         // ============================================
00052         public NetworkStore() : base(typeof(UserInfo), 
00053                                      typeof(string),
00054                                      typeof(Gdk.Pixbuf))
00055         {
00056 #if false
00057             // Removed because Generate a Thread error, that throw Exception
00058             SetSortColumnId(COL_NAME, SortType.Ascending);
00059             DefaultSortFunc = new TreeIterCompareFunc(StoreSortFunc);
00060 #endif
00061         }
00062 
00063         // ============================================
00064         // PUBLIC Methods
00065         // ============================================
00067         public void Add (UserInfo userInfo) {
00068             Remove(userInfo);
00069 
00070             // Setup Pixbuf
00071             Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf;
00072             if (userInfo.SecureAuthentication == true) {
00073                 if (userInfo.IsOnline == true) {
00074                     pixbuf = StockIcons.GetPixbuf("Network", 74);
00075                 } else {
00076                     pixbuf = StockIcons.GetPixbuf("NetworkOffline", 74);
00077                 }
00078             } else {
00079                 pixbuf = StockIcons.GetPixbuf("NetworkInsecure", 74);
00080             }
00081 
00082             lock (this) {
00083                 AppendValues(userInfo, userInfo.GetName(), pixbuf);
00084             }
00085         }
00086 
00088         public void Add (UserInfo[] users) {
00089             if (users != null) {
00090                 lock (this) {
00091                     foreach (UserInfo userInfo in users)
00092                         Add(userInfo);
00093                 }
00094             }
00095         }
00096 
00098         public void Remove (UserInfo userInfo) {
00099             this.rmUser = userInfo;
00100             this.Foreach(RemoveForeach);
00101             this.rmUser = null;
00102         }
00103 
00105         public void Remove (UserInfo[] users) {
00106             if (users != null) {
00107                 lock (this) {
00108                     foreach (UserInfo userInfo in users)
00109                         Remove(userInfo);
00110                 }
00111             }
00112         }
00113 
00115         public void RemoveAllOffline() {
00116             UserInfo[] users = GetOfflineUsers();
00117             if (users != null) Remove(users);
00118         }
00119 
00121         public UserInfo[] GetOfflineUsers() {
00122             ArrayList offlineUsers = new ArrayList();
00123 
00124             lock (this) {
00125                 foreach (object[] row in this) {
00126                     UserInfo userInfo = row[COL_USER_INFO] as UserInfo;
00127                     if (userInfo.IsOnline == false)
00128                         offlineUsers.Add(userInfo);
00129                 }
00130             }
00131 
00132             return((UserInfo[]) offlineUsers.ToArray(typeof(UserInfo)));
00133         }
00134 
00136         public UserInfo GetUserInfo (TreePath path) {
00137             TreeIter iter;
00138             GetIter(out iter, path);
00139             return((UserInfo) GetValue(iter, COL_USER_INFO));
00140         }
00141 
00143         public UserInfo GetUserInfo (TreeIter iter) {
00144             return((UserInfo) GetValue(iter, COL_USER_INFO));
00145         }
00146 
00148         public string GetName (TreePath path) {
00149             TreeIter iter;
00150             GetIter(out iter, path);
00151             return((string) GetValue(iter, COL_NAME));
00152         }
00153 
00155         public string GetName (TreeIter iter) {
00156             return((string) GetValue(iter, COL_NAME));
00157         }
00158 
00160         public Gdk.Pixbuf GetPixbuf (TreePath path) {
00161             TreeIter iter;
00162             GetIter(out iter, path);
00163             return((Gdk.Pixbuf) GetValue(iter, COL_PIXBUF));
00164         }
00165 
00167         public Gdk.Pixbuf GetPixbuf (TreeIter iter) {
00168             return((Gdk.Pixbuf) GetValue(iter, COL_PIXBUF));
00169         }
00170 
00171         // ============================================
00172         // PRIVATE Methods
00173         // ============================================
00174 #if false
00175         // Removed because Generate a Thread error, that throw Exception
00176         private int StoreSortFunc (TreeModel model, TreeIter a, TreeIter b) {
00177             string a_name = (string) model.GetValue(a, COL_NAME);
00178             string b_name = (string) model.GetValue(b, COL_NAME);
00179             return(String.Compare(a_name, b_name));
00180         }
00181 #endif
00182 
00183         private bool RemoveForeach (TreeModel model, TreePath path, TreeIter iter) {
00184             lock (this.rmUser) {
00185                 //if (GetUserInfo(iter) == this.rmUser) {
00186                 if (GetUserInfo(iter).CompareTo(this.rmUser) == 0) {
00187                     this.Remove(ref iter);
00188                     return(true);
00189                 }
00190                 return(false);
00191             }
00192         }
00193     }
00194 }
